parameter.abstract: 0: no BRDF correction, 1: correction with cosine of local solar zenith angle (BRDF equation with b=1) 2: correction with sqrt(cos) of local solar zenith angle (BRDF equation with b=0.5) 11: correction with cosine of local solar zenith angle (BRDF equation with b=1), for soil/sand. Vegetation: BRDF equation but with exponent b=1/3 (lambda less than 720 nm), and b=3/4 (lambda greater than 720 nm), (weak correction). 12: correction with cosine of local solar zenith angle (BRDF equation with b=1), for soil/sand. Vegetation: (BRDF equation) but with exponent b=1.0 (lambda less than 720 nm), and b=3/4 (lambda greater than 720 nm), (strong correction), 21: correction with sqrt(cos) of local solar zenith angle (BRDF equation with b=1/2), for soil/sand. Vegetation: (BRDF equation) but with exponent b=1/3 (lambda less than 720 nm), and b=3/4 (lambda greater than 720 nm), (weak correction). This is the recommended standard yielding good results in most cases. 22: correction with sqrt(cos) of local solar zenith angle (BRDF equation with b=1/2), for soil/sand. Vegetation: (BRDF equation) but with exponent b=1.0 (lambda less than 720 nm), and b=3/4 (lambda greater than 720 nm, (strong correction)

workflow.title: Sentinel-2 atmospheric correction using SEN2COR
workflow.abstract: This processing services applies the SEN2COR atmospheric correction to Sentinel-2 Level 1C tiles. The inputs are thus Sentinel-2 products containing Top of Atmosphere reflectances (TOA) and the outputs are Sentinel-2 products including the tiles covering the area of interest and containing Bottom of Atmosphere reflectances (BOA) and optionally terrain- and cirrus corrected reflectance images, Aerosol Optical Thickness-, Water Vapour-, Scene Classification maps and Quality Indicators, including cloud and snow probabilities.
